About.paragraph: Kitty Kads are NFT kitties you can play with.
About.paragraph2: Each one being a one of a kind NFT you can collect, trade and breed.
About.paragraph3: Oh, did we mention that they also provide purrks for future Kitty Kad games and dapps?

Highlights.name: 10,000 Gen 0s
Highlights.text: All other kitties can only come from these. Gen 0s will also give holders extra perks

Highlights.name: Rarity
Highlights.text: No two kitties are the same, which also means some kitties are more rare and coveted

Highlights.name: 3% Trade Fees
Highlights.text: To prevent artifical price hikes, a 3% trade fee will be taken from all sales

Highlights.name: Breeding
Highlights.text: To set a floor price, there's a breeding fee of at least 1 KDA (price may change)

Highlights.name: Pimp Your Kitties
Highlights.text: Earn money by letting others breed with your prestigious kitties to get its genes

Highlights.name: Cooldowns
Highlights.text: Earlier generation breed faster, however different genes also impact cooldowns

Roadmap.title: Gen 0 Mint - Q1
Roadmap.text: First mints start. Gen 0 kitties can be used to create future generations

Roadmap.title: Breeding & Trading - Q1
Roadmap.text: Breeding of kitties will be enabled to allow users to mix and match kitties

Roadmap.title: Defi Integration - Q2
Roadmap.text: Use Gen0 kitties for exclusive defi perks in upcoming dapps

Roadmap.title: Kitty Kad Games - Q3
Roadmap.text: New gaming world powered by Kitty Kad tokens and NFTs

Tokenomics.title: 10,000 Gen 0s
Tokenomics.text: Kitties will be released in waves and can be purchased for 1 KDA and later in Kitty Kad tokens

Tokenomics.title: Breeding
Tokenomics.text: Kitties can be put up for breeding to make new kitties, in exchange for a fee

Tokenomics.title: Prizes and Whitelists
Tokenomics.text: Part of the Gen 0 slots will be reserved for prize and whitelist winners

Tokenomics.title: 3% Trade Fees
Tokenomics.text: To prevent fake price pumps, a trade fee is applied to all sales. All profits go directly to cat foundations

Socials.link: Fair launch will happen across DEX's on the Kadena ecosystem

Socials.title: NFTs - Q1 '22
Socials.text: Cat themed NFTs coming to the Kadena blockchain

Socials.title: Games and Dapps - Q2 '22
Socials.text: Community themed games and dapps linked to the Kitty Kad token

Socials.title: Cross-chain - H2 '22
Socials.text: Via Kadena's bridges, the token will be available on more chains to allow more users to join

Projects.title: Token Price Tracker
Projects.text: Tool that tracks the price of tokens native to Kadena

Projects.title: Token
Projects.text: A cute token Kitty Kad token, central to all the dapps

Projects.title: NFTs Based Games
Projects.text: Use your NFTs as characters inside games

Projects.title: Defi Dapps
Projects.text: The Kitty Kad defi ecosystem, powered by cats and love
